entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is hiding in a flower bed below the living room window to avoid his aunt and uncle.

entities.name: vernon dursley
entities.description: Vernon Dursley is Harry's uncle who is grumpy and dislikes Harry's presence.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is Harry's aunt who is unconcerned about Harry's whereabouts.

relationships.description: Vernon Dursley dislikes Harry and is glad that he has stopped trying to butt in.
Harry is hiding from Aunt Petunia, indicating a relationship of avoidance.
